Create or Edit Express VI Dialog Box

Requires: Base Development System

Select Tools»Advanced»Create or Edit Express VI to display this dialog box.

Use this dialog box to create, edit, rename, move, or validate an Express VI.

This dialog box includes the following components:

  • Express VIs—Displays a list of Express VIs and their VI components that you can select for editing. Each top-level item in this tree is an Express VI. Each Express VI contains a source VI and a configuration dialog box VI, listed in that order.
  • Path—Displays the path to the directory where the Express VI or component selected in the Express VIs tree is located.
  • New—Opens the Express VI Creator wizard.
  • Open—Opens the source VI or configuration dialog box VI selected in the Express VIs tree.
  • Rename—Opens the Rename Express VI dialog box.
  • Delete—Deletes the Express VI selected in the Express VIs tree.
  • Validate—Opens the Validation dialog box.
  • Refresh—Updates the Express VIs tree.
